entry.title: Azure-Samples/Durable-Task-Scheduler
entry.summary: Durable task scheduler, currently in preview, is a managed backend for durable execution in Azure. The Durable task scheduler provides high performance, reliability, and an easy monitoring experience for stateful orchestrations
